name: rapida
description: Dev scripts for the rapida multi-package repo

scripts.storybook: concurrently "cd ../packages/rapida && npm run storybook" "cd ../packages/rapida-physics && npm run storybook"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd ../packages/rapida-physics && npm i" "cd ../packages/rapida-common && npm i" "cd ../packages/rapida && npm i" "cd ../packages/rapida-server && npm i"
scripts.build: (cd ../packages/rapida-common && npm run build) && (cd ../packages/rapida-physics && npm run build) && concurrently "cd ../packages/rapida && npm run build" "cd ../packages/rapida-server && npm run build"
scripts.docs: concurrently "cd ../packages/rapida-physics && npm run docs" "cd ../packages/rapida && npm run docs"
scripts.prerelease: npm run install && npm run build && npm run test && npm run docs
